text: walaqad kdhdhab alkfar rusulana min qablik arslhm allah taealaa 'iilaa ammhm wa'uwdhuu fi sbylh, fasabaruu ealaa dhlk wmdu fi daeawtuhum wjhadhm hataa 'atahum nasr allh. wala mubadil likalimat allh, wahi ma 'unzil ealaa nabih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam min waedah 'iiaah bialnasr ealaa man eadah. walaqad ja'ak -ayha alrswl- min khabar man kan qablak min alrsl, wama tuhaqiq lahum min nasr allh, wama jaraa ealaa mkdhbyhm min nqmt allah minhum wghdbh elyhm, falak fymn taqadam min alrusul 'uswat wqdw. wafi hdha tslyt llrswl salaa allah ealayh wslm
